original_title: Squish, Splat, Sploosh: The Stellar Sounds of 'Men in Black II'
overview: A look behind the scenes of MIIB to watch the foley artists at work adding all the background and special effects noises to the finished scenes. Covering everything from an alien battle to Agent J walking across a floor, we see what they use and how they use it.
title: Squish, Splat, Sploosh: The Stellar Sounds of 'Men in Black II'
